name.en: Practical Project on Social Return on Investment
name.ch: 社會投資報酬分析實務專題

department.ch: 永續領導力碩士學位學程

goal.ch: This course aims to introduce the Social Return on Investment (SROI) framework with practical projects. Students can learn how to implement such a framework to measure and manage organizations‘ impacts, which is an essential skill for ESG or sustainability management.
goal.en: This course aims to introduce the Social Return on Investment (SROI) framework with practical projects. Students can learn how to implement such a framework to measure and manage organizations‘ impacts, which is an essential skill for ESG or sustainability management.

outline.ch: “專題內容與期程介紹SROI導論，案例介紹SROI Stage 1實務座談SROI Stage 1實務座談實地訪查SROI Stage 2實務座談SROI Stage 2實務座談進度報告會議SROI Stage 3實務座談SROI Stage 3實務座談SROI Stage 4實務座談SROI Stage 4實務座談實地訪查SROI Stage 5實務座談SROI Stage 5實務座談SROI Stage 6實務座談SROI Stage 6專題檢討專題成果發表會“
outline.en: “專題內容與期程介紹SROI導論，案例介紹SROI Stage 1實務座談SROI Stage 1實務座談實地訪查SROI Stage 2實務座談SROI Stage 2實務座談進度報告會議SROI Stage 3實務座談SROI Stage 3實務座談SROI Stage 4實務座談SROI Stage 4實務座談實地訪查SROI Stage 5實務座談SROI Stage 5實務座談SROI Stage 6實務座談SROI Stage 6專題檢討專題成果發表會“

ch: 系所:限永續領導力碩士學位學程、永續領導力博士學位學程。
學院:限永續與綠能科技研究學院。
en: Department:Master Programs, Sustainability Leadership、Ph.D. Programs, Sustainability Leadership only.
Faculty:College of Graduate College of Sustainability and Green Energy only.
